ygData.subject: Re: mistmoore faction
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Aye i too came across that little piece of info. That story greatly intrigued me. I thought i would have to wait for the PoH to open before i found out
ygData.messageBody:
> by the way, did you know xicotl of mistmoore was a
> founding member of the
> dismal rage of freeport? maybe he is an sk trainer..
> or maybe he even gives
> out a quest. hmm
>
> Beld Demonblade
> Fennin Ro
>
>
> -

Aye i too came across that little piece of info. That
story greatly intrigued me.
I thought i would have to wait for the PoH to open
before i found out more about it. Glad to see he's
found new friends :)

For a brief recap,for those who may not know,of that
story as i remember it:

Peitro Zarn (the main SK guildmaster in Freeport)
"saved" Opal, the cleric GM (name?), and Xicotl (a
troll, didnt notice any class reference) from wasted
lives or some such thing. Xicotl was an etremely
intelligent troll apparently. He eventually tried to
take the Dismal Rage over, but Zarn summoned the
powers of Innoruuk and banished Xicotl to the Plane of
Hate.

End Story

I am indeed curious as to what he has to say about
Zarn and company.
Does he still follow Innoruuk? or has he converted to
another dark god?

On another note:

I did one of those stupid bard delivery quests and
noticed my faction with Mistmoore himself dropped. Any
clue why?
Looks like Lenya may be biting the dust soon :)
I want to try my hardest to get in good with the MM
crowd. Would beinteresting to just go walking thru
there saying high to everyone. Pipedream? maybe. guess
i'll find out.


Bathory D'Allatu

=====
